### Free Online Texts

Here are a list of online textbooks that may be helpful in this competition.

-- [R for Data Science (1e)](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/)

-- [R for Data Science (2e)](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/)

-- [Forecasting: Principles and Practice](https://otexts.com/fpp2/)

-- [An Introduction to Statistical Learning](https://www.statlearning.com/)

### Articles

Here are a list of online articles that may be helpful in the modeling and predicting of point spreads.

-- [Creating a College Basketball Metric to Predict Point Spreads for March MadnessArticle](https://medium.com/@jriordan1/creating-a-college-basketball-metric-to-predict-point-spreads-for-march-madness-02bbdf048e99)

-- [Confidence vs Prediction Intervals: Understanding the Difference](https://www.datacamp.com/blog/confidence-intervals-vs-prediction-intervals)
